name: Semplice - Grid Starter Kit
description:
This is an unofficial kit made by me, a Semplice user. I use Semplice for my personal website and found the grid system to be confusing. The grid styles are based on Semplice breakpoints. I also added grid styles for a 4-8 column blog page.


This kit has double-grids. The hairline guides are column breakpoints and the thick guides are gutters:


  • use gutter-width guides for content
  • use hairline guides for columns (background colors)


Add comments below if needed :)
